events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a car collision that occurred on April 9th involving two vehicles.
The claim was categorized as an Auto Accident based on the description mentioning a car collision.
An agent was assigned to the claim promptly to ensure thorough investigation and customer assistance.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer of priority handling.
Request was sent for additional documents including the police report, photos of damage, and driver statements.
Customer submitted the requested police report along with clear pictures of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision was initiated by the claims department.
The investigation confirmed fault based on evidence and witness statements, facilitating claim approval.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs and rental vehicle expenses.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the quick and fair settlement offer.
Formal approval was granted for full settlement as per the negotiated offer after customer acceptance.
Payment for repairs and related expenses was processed and issued to the claimantâ€™s preferred account.
Claim was officially closed following payment issuance and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
All claim documents and communications were archived in the system for future reference and compliance.
